item.title: Python a Function Convert Percentage in String/Object Type Columns to Numbers
Python a small Function Convert Boolean Characters to Boolean Type in String/Object Columns
item.description: Converts boolean characters to boolean type if provided as ’t’ or ‘f’ in String/Object type columns. def str_to_bool(s): if s == 't': return True else: return False Usage col = "Availability" df[col] = df[col].apply(str_to_bool)

item.title: 書籍 Kaggleで勝つデータ分析
item.description: Kaggleで勝つデータ分析の技術 門脇 大輔 良い点：網羅的、リファレンス多数 注意点：精読が必要、中級者向け https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B07YTDBC3Z/ 書籍「Kaggleで勝つデータ分析」 概要 書籍「Kagg
